instruction: What is the role of the transformer network structure in the proposed Raman ConvMSANet model for blood and semen identification?

However, it is mentioned that the multihead self-attention mechanism does not perform well in extracting local feature peaks. Therefore, in the Raman ConvMSANet model, the transformer network structure is combined with one-dimensional convolution to overcome this limitation and achieve more accurate identification results.
